points.point: Lead a team of five to develop a mental health awareness application
Developed a cross-platform app using MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React-Native, NodeJS) and Expo
Implemented a user friendly interface, basic user features, and user security features.
Integrated with Tumblr API and TensorflowJS to provide users an individualized experience.
Collabotred in a small team to develop two versions of Battle Ship using JS/CSS/HTML and PyGame.
Designed and implemented web-app version from scratch, primarly working on the game logic.
Refactored and implemented new features to existing version of BattleShip. Updated from CLI to GUI using PyGame.
Implemented multiple difficulties of computer controlled bots for single player gameplay
Worked with World Wide Technologies to develop a dispatcher for managing intake, delivery, and stock.
Trained reinforcement learning agent using Q learning. Developed novel methods to reduce the training space.
Improved efficiency over reedy based approaches by 20\% with respect to employee downtime and total time used.
